ivardefs.name: amount
ivardefs.desc: The monetary amount allocated from the total payment to the payable.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date from the response resource containing a commitment to pay.

ivardefs.name: identifier
ivardefs.desc: Unique identifier for the current payment item for the referenced payable.

ivardefs.name: payee
ivardefs.desc: The party which is receiving the payment.

ivardefs.name: predecessor
ivardefs.desc: Unique identifier for the prior payment item for the referenced payable.

ivardefs.name: request
ivardefs.desc: A resource, such as a Claim, the evaluation of which could lead to payment.

ivardefs.name: response
ivardefs.desc: A resource, such as a ClaimResponse, which contains a commitment to payment.

ivardefs.name: responsible
ivardefs.desc: A reference to the individual who is responsible for inquiries regarding the response and its payment.

ivardefs.name: submitter
ivardefs.desc: The party which submitted the claim or financial transaction.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Code to indicate the nature of the payment.

properties.desc: Distribution of the payment amount for a previously acknowledged payable.
